summary: This document is an email forwarded on June 24, 2020, containing a message from an individual who identifies as both a victim and a witness in the Jeffrey Epstein case. The individual requests to be allowed to speak in court about the case.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the case; the individual writing identifies as a victim and witness regarding him.

keyFacts: An individual identifies themselves as both a victim and a witness in the Jeffrey Epstein case.
The individual requests to be allowed to speak in court about the case.
The communication was sent via email on June 24, 2020.
The individual states they are a 'Healthy Person' and wishes to visit the court.
The document is a forwarded email, suggesting it was sent to an official or legal recipient.
